examples.chinese: 我在邠(邠)看到了古代遗迹(古代遺跡)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zài Bīn kàn dào le gǔdài yíjì.
examples.english: I saw ancient relics in Bin.

examples.chinese: 古时的邠(古時的邠)是繁华的贸易中心(是繁華的貿易中心)，商旅络绎不绝(商旅絡繹不絕)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔshí de Bīn shì fánhuá de màoyì zhōngxīn, shānglǚ luòyì bùjué.
examples.english: In ancient times, Bin was a prosperous trade center, attracting an endless stream of merchants.
